ValidationRule.description: The Contract Type field needs at least one entry to Win an Opportunity.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISBLANK ( Contract_Type__c ) && TEXT ( StageName ) = 'Closed Won' && RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Assumptive Renewal'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: At least 1 Contract Type entry is required for this kind of Opportunity.
